    ImgHelpR-vignette

Crop

Source: R/Crop.R
Crop.Rd

Crop image to desired size

Usage

Crop(img, height, width)

Arguments

img

----Array, input image array

height

----Int, height of the desired image

width

----Int, width of the desired image

Value

The cropped image

Examples

img <- array(runif(1000),dim=c(10,10,3))
Crop(img, 8,8)
